title: Ouroboros
description: What value do YOU place on friendship?Heartbroken, Cam leaves his home in search of answers. His journey presents new challenges and opportunities, making new friends and reuniting with old ones. Just as Cam and Freyjaâ€™s life comes full circle, their friends and community are threatened, forcing them to defend those they love. In this third instalment of the Antipodes series, friendships are tested when the horrifying truth of why they were chosen is discovered.
author: T.S. Simons
